review: My 3 yr old twins can switch from TV to the fire stick with ease and pick a show... Love it
author: cassandra brown

review: It should be called amazing fire stick
author: Brian

review: Exactly what they said it was and the shipping was fast
author: Samantha Orr

review: This is a great affordable device.  I now watch Hulu, Netflix and Amazon prime streaming from all my TVs!  Great!
author: Marci L. Purinton

review: The streaming service will only be as good as your internet connection. Wish it could download more than just apps, like movies, but the product came and is as advertised.
author: Jason

review: Best buy for the buck.  Grandchildren enjoyed games on par with Xbox.  Prime music, movies, and television on demand.
author: John Devere
